title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil in win32 currently lacks a private constructor.
EB: A private constructor should be added. Since there are no non-static methods in this class, it is advisable to have a private constructor. This prevents unnecessary instantiation of the class and does not add any size, as the compiler provides a free public constructor by default.
SR:
1. Open the BidiUtil class in win32.
2. Observe the absence of a private constructor.
3. Add a private constructor to the BidiUtil class.
